NAME

icbsam - calculate the mean SAM between two image cubes

SYNOPSIS

icbsam [-vo] icbfile1 icbfile2

OPTIONS

-vo
Output only the value of the mean SAM.

DESCRIPTION

icbdist prints the mean spectral angle mapper (SAM) between two image-cube files, icbfile1 and icbfile2, to stdout. icbfile1 and icbfile2 are both ICB-format files.

If the option -vo is specified, then icbdist prints a terse output, consisting of only the value of the mean SAM, to stdout.

The mean SAM is calculated, in degrees, via a call to QccHYPImageCubeMeanSAM(3) .

SEE ALSO

QccHYPImageCubeMeanSAM(3) , QccIMGImageCube(3) , QccPackHYP(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
